text: Salerno is a southern Italian city. It has a port. It faces the Mediterranean Sea. It is capital of the province of Salerno. File:Salerno looking S from hill.jpg|View of Salerno File:Salerno-PanoramaMazzoDellaSignora.jpg|View of Salerno Category:Cities in Campania Category:Capital cities in Italy Category:Settlements in Salerno
title: Salerno
